Dear students, welcome to the course for Summer Semester 2024.
I look forward to welcoming you to the sessions we will have together.
To get an idea of how many students, and from which backgrounds you are coming,  I would be grateful if you could send me an email at.
with a brief introduction to you and your degree programme.
Please also fill out your information in the section below titled "Bitte sofort nach Eintragen in den Kurs ausfüllen!, This is important for receiving your marks later.

Our sessions together will take place in person on Thursdays. Our first meeting will be on Thursday, 25.04.2023, 12:00, at room BA316, Hardenbergstr. 40, in the seminar room of Fachgebiet Keramische Werkstoffe.  Hopefully this should be our regular timeslot.
These sessions are intended as cross-disciplinary discussion and exchange, as well as a tutorials. The content for the course is available for you to self-access here on ISIS.
Please check the announcements page for updates on our next session.
